overview: A rural girl, Pan Jinlian, dreams of gaining a firm foothold in the city and achieving her career. However, as soon as he entered the city, he encountered unspoken rules, compensation, working to pay off debts and other bizarre incidents, and had to live under the same roof with GAY Miwu Saburo. A newcomer to a nightclub to accompany a drink, a rich woman who pretended to be a straight man, faced with the elder brother Wu Dalang who always wanted to sell them for money, and Ximen Qing and Wang Po who set up traps for them to voluntarily sacrifice themselves. They fought wits and courage. In the end, Pan Jinlian not only became a new generation of graphic models, but also found a love destination for herself like a queen.
title: Pan Jinlian Go!
